body_html:
Thanks for the comment, as additional information:
I see this effect whether I set the environment variable in the shell before starting my python script/interactive session or if I set it via os.environ["..."] inside the python script before importing tensorflow.

body:
Thanks for the comment, as additional information:
I see this effect whether I set the environment variable in the shell before starting my python script/interactive session or if I set it via os.environ["..."] inside the python script before importing tensorflow.
